response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value for us at $1,000,000, but considering its importance to you, we believe it's a perfect match. We are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an exceptional deal, considering the immense value this product would bring to you. We trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope to hear back from you soon. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Sincerely, [Your Name]", "product_price": 950000}
